item.title: Nigerian billionaire plans expansion of Africa's biggest oil refinery
item.description: Africa’s largest refinery is seeking to expand its capacity to 1.4 million with a goal of becoming the world’s largest refinery

item.title: Huntington Bancshares buying Cadence Bank in $7.4 billion all-stock deal
item.description: Huntington Bancshares is buying regional bank Cadence Bank in an all-stock deal valued at $7.4 billion that will strengthen its position across the So...

item.title: Private donors gave more than $125M to keep foreign aid programs going after US cuts
item.description: Efforts to back fill some of the cuts to U.S. foreign aid by the Trump administration raised over $125 million in eight months

item.title: Republicans grapple with voter frustration over rising health care premiums
item.description: Notices of rising health insurance premiums are landing in voters’ mailboxes and sending some to town halls to vent their frustration

item.title: China's C919 jet faces turbulent skies amid US-China trade tensions
item.description: China's ambition to rival Boeing and Airbus with its homegrown C919 passenger jet is hitting turbulent skies
